Question 43.Question: Why didnâ€™t you use GenAI for feedback on your work?
Question 43.Response:
I think that it does not serve me academically to rely on an advanced language model to give me feedback, it also does not encourage skills that I may require to later find employment. 

I see the benefit of GenAI is really reducing the admin required to complete tasks, if it can help me condense information and develop an understanding of a topic then I see a great deal of benefit from its use. However, I want to develop MY skills and knowledge whilst at university, thus I do not use it to generate or evaluate any of my work.
